metadata.title: CVE-2023-37117 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-use-after-free vulnerability was found in live555 version 2023.05.10while handling the SETUP.

criterions.comment: liblivemedia: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
